author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Sunday announced a solatium of Rs. 3 lakh each to the families of 23 police personnel who died in various incidents across the State.

CM’s relief fund

Expressing deep condolences to the families, Ms. Jayalalithaa in a statement said the solatium would be granted from Chief Minister Public Relief Fund.

A total of 23 personnel lost their lives in 21 different incidents in various districts across the State between July and September last year. While 12 of the personnel died of illness, six due to cardiac arrest and the rest in accidents. One head constable died of electric shock.
title: Solatium announced
